name: The Great Beautician Interactive
description:
A top down game that combines stealth and shooter mechanics, as you, The Great Beautician, take on your greatest challenge yet- take down a new gang called the Uglies! Gather information in stealth levels to find your way to their hidden facilities, where you’ll gun through hordes of enemies and fight one of the gang’s bosses! Collect coins to unlock weapons and equipment, all whilst looking fabulous.

Feedback Link: https://forms.gle/GxaVyrLX9t3YJacB6
